name: be-frontendbackendcounter-karin167
description: 1. Create two folders into this project     - frontend     - backend 2. Into the frontend, create a minimal react app     - Two buttons; one for each backend endpoint 3. Into the backend, create a minimal express backend with two      - GET "/"     - POST "/" 4. The functionality should be just a basic counter     - The backend is just a counter     - The GET endpoint returns the current number     - The POST endpoint increases the current number by 1
